verses.verse: A Song<WH7892> and Psalm<WH4210> for the sons<WH1121> of Korah<WH7141>. Great<WH1419> is the LORD<WH3068>, and greatly<WH3966> to be praised<WH1984> in the city<WH5892> of our God<WH430>, in the mountain<WH2022> of his holiness<WH6944>. for: or, of

Beautiful<WH3303> for situation<WH5131>, the joy<WH4885> of the whole earth<WH776>, is mount<WH2022> Zion<WH6726>, on the sides<WH3411> of the north<WH6828>, the city<WH7151> of the great<WH7227> King<WH4428>.
God<WH430> is known<WH3045> in her palaces<WH759> for a refuge<WH4869>.
For, lo, the kings<WH4428> were assembled<WH3259>, they passed by<WH5674> together<WH3162>.
They saw<WH7200> it, and so they marvelled<WH8539>; they were troubled<WH926>, and hasted away<WH2648>.
Fear<WH7461> took hold<WH270> upon them there, and pain<WH2427>, as of a woman in travail<WH3205>.
Thou breakest<WH7665> the ships<WH591> of Tarshish<WH8659> with an east<WH6921> wind<WH7307>.

As we have heard<WH8085>, so have we seen<WH7200> in the city<WH5892> of the LORD<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>, in the city<WH5892> of our God<WH430>: God<WH430> will establish<WH3559> it for<WH5704> ever<WH5769>. Selah<WH5542>.
We have thought<WH1819> of thy lovingkindness<WH2617>, O God<WH430>, in the midst<WH7130> of thy temple<WH1964>.
According to thy name<WH8034>, O God<WH430>, so is thy praise<WH8416> unto the ends<WH7099> of the earth<WH776>: thy right hand<WH3225> is full<WH4390> of righteousness<WH6664>.
Let mount<WH2022> Zion<WH6726> rejoice<WH8055>, let the daughters<WH1323> of Judah<WH3063> be glad<WH1523>, because of thy judgments<WH4941>.
Walk about<WH5437> Zion<WH6726>, and go round about<WH5362> her: tell<WH5608> the towers<WH4026> thereof.

Mark<WH7896> ye well<WH3820> her bulwarks<WH2430>, consider<WH6448> her palaces<WH759>; that ye may tell<WH5608> it to the generation<WH1755> following<WH314>. Mark: Heb. Set your heart to consider: or, raise up
For this God<WH430> is our God<WH430> for ever<WH5769> and ever<WH5703>: he will be our guide<WH5090> even unto death<WH4192>.
